name: Administrator
description: Full system access with all administrative privileges including user management, system configuration, and complete data access

name: Farm Manager
description: Operational management role with access to vehicle assignments, operation planning, and performance reporting

name: Vehicle Operator
description: Field operator role with access to assigned vehicles, operation logging, and fuel recording

name: Field Supervisor
description: Supervisory role with oversight of field operations, operator management, and equipment coordination

name: Maintenance Technician
description: Technical role focused on vehicle maintenance, repair tracking, and equipment status management
